title: The Feds Push WebAssembly for Cloud Native Security
author: B Cameron Gain; Alex Williams
description: The U.S. government says WebAssembly could and should be integrated across the cloud native service mesh sphere in particular to enhance security.
cntitle: 联邦政府推动 WebAssembly 提升云原生安全
cndescription: 美国政府表示，WebAssembly尤其应该并且能够集成到云原生服务网格领域，以增强安全性。
